title: You Know Who I Am?
transcript: You know who I am?

title: Wind-up Monkey
transcript: I asked why you stopped playing, and your version of an answer was to turn into a wind-up monkey.

title: Jacket
transcript: Oopsie daisy, forgot my jacket.

title: Because You're Cute
transcript: Well you're in the first chair, let's see if it's just because you're cute. Three four–*music plays*–Yep, that's why.

title: Squeaker
transcript: We got a squeaker today, people.

title: Do Not Come Early
transcript: Barker, that is not your boyfriend's dick. Do not come early.

title: Upsets Me
transcript: Now this one really upsets me.

title: Last Chance
transcript: Whoever it is, this is your last chance.

title: Mars Bar
transcript: What are you, there's no fucking Mars Bar down there, what are you looking at?

title: Out of Tune
transcript: Do you think you're out of tune?

title: Why Didn't You Say So
transcript: Then why the fuck didn't you say so?

title: Fat Ass
transcript: I've carried your fat ass for too long.

title: Fat Ass (Extended Ver.)
transcript: I've carried your fat ass for too long, Metz, I'm not gonna have you cost us a competition because your mind is on a fucking happy meal instead of on pitch.

title: Get the Fuck Out
transcript: Why are you still sitting there? Get the fuck out.

title: Relax
transcript: The key is to just relax.

title: *Clears Throat*
transcript: *clears throat*

title: Not My Tempo
transcript: Not quite my tempo.

title: Chair
transcript: Why do you suppose I just hurled a chair at your head, Neiman?

title: Rushing / Dragging V1
transcript: Were you rushing or were you dragging?

title: In Four
transcript: In four, dammit.

title: Rushing / Dragging V2
transcript: Was I rushing or was I dragging?

title: Rushing / Dragging V3
transcript: Rushing or dragging? *Rushing* So you do know the difference.

title: Pig
transcript: I will fuck you like a pig.

title: Rushing / Dragging V4
transcript: Now are you a rusher, or are you a dragger, or are you gonna be on my fucking time?

title: Retards At Shaffer
transcript: Jesus fucking christ, I didn't know they allowed retards into Shaffer.

title: A Cappella Group
transcript: Bababa, what are you in a fucking a cappella group? Play the goddamn kit.

title: Rushing / Dragging Finale
transcript: Were you rushing, or were you dragging? Answer.

title: *Tear*
transcript: Are you one of those single-tear people? Do I look like a double fucking rainbow to you?

title: Mommy Left Daddy
transcript: You are a worthless, friendless, faggot-lipped piece of shit, whose Mommy left Daddy when she figured out he wasn't Eugene O'Neill, and who is now weeping and slobbering all over my drum set like a fucking 9-year old girl. So for the final father-fucking time, say it louder. [Neiman] I'm upset.

title: Neiman - I'm Upset
transcript: I'm upset.

title: Listen Up Cocksuckers
transcript: Listen up cocksuckers.

title: Tonal Catastrophe
transcript: Tanner, the kit is a fucking tonal catastrophe.

title: Limp Dick
transcript: Limp-dick, sour-note, flatter-than-their-girlfriends, flexible-tempo dipshits.

title: Limp Dick (Extended Ver.)
transcript: And I'm not gonna have my reputation in that department tarnished by a bunch of fuckin' limp-dick, sour-note, flatter-than-their-girlfriends, flexible-tempo dipshits, got it?

title: I Will Stop Being so Polite
transcript: If I ever find one of these lying around again, I swear to fucking God, I will stop being so polite.

title: Demolish
transcript: Get the fuck out of my sight before I demolish you.

title: Mini-Me
transcript: I can still fucking see you, mini-me.

title: Calculator
transcript: You give a calculator to a fucking retard, he's gonna try to turn on a TV with it.

title: Are You Fucking Kidding Me?
transcript: Are you fucking kidding me?

title: Sanjay Gupta
transcript: A medical condition? What, are you fucking Sanjay Gupta? Play the goddamn music.

title: Let's Get to Work, Ladies
transcript: Alright, let's get to work, ladies.

title: Statue
transcript: Tanner, are you a fucking statue? Let's go.

title: Not Now
transcript: I said not now.

title: Earn the Part
transcript: If you want the fucking part, earn it.

title: Sorry
transcript: I'm sorry.

title: Motherfucker
transcript: Motherfucker.

title: Play in Time
transcript: We will stay here for as long as it takes until one of you faggots can play in time.

title: Not My Tempo (Redux)
transcript: Not my fucking tempo.

title: You Hear Me?
transcript: You hear me cocksuckers?

title: You Hear Me? (Extended Ver.)
transcript: You hear me cocksuckers? You better start shitting me perfect 400s. Connolly, get your fucking ass back on the kit.

title: Hymie
transcript: You worthless, hymie fuck.

title: Hymie (Extended Ver.)
transcript: Is that really the fastest you can play, you worthless, hymie fuck? No wonder mommy ran out on you, get off the fucking kit.

title: Mommy Ran Out
transcript: No wonder mommy ran out on you.

title: Mr. Gay Pride
transcript: And, here comes Mr. Gay Pride of the Upper West Side himself.

title: Mr. Gay Pride (Extended Ver.)
transcript: And, here comes Mr. Gay Pride of the Upper West Side himself. Unforunately this is not a Bette Midler concert. We will not be serving cosmopolitans and baked Alaska, so just play faster than you give fucking handjobs, will you please?

title: Handjobs
transcript: So just play faster than you give handjobs, will you please?

title: Not Even Fucking Close
transcript: Not even fucking close.

title: Leprechaun
transcript: You know, you actually do look quite a bit like a leprechaun.

title: Leprechaun (Extended Ver.)
transcript: Let's go with the Irish Mick fucking Paddy cracker now. You know, you actually do look quite a bit like a leprechaun. I think I'm gonna start calling you Flannery.

title: Get Off
transcript: Get off.

title: Pot of Gold
transcript: What the fuck are you looking for? There's no pot of gold down there.

title: Pot of Gold (Extended Ver.)
transcript: What the fuck are you looking for? There's no pot of gold down there. Adjusting your seat, really? That's been your problem the whole time? The seat height? So now you have it, right?

title: Bullshit Fuck You
transcript: Bullshit, fuck you.

title: Faster
transcript: Faster.

title: Keep Playing
transcript: Keep playing, keep playing, keep playing.

title: Don't Stop
transcript: Don't stop.

title: I Don't Give a Shit
transcript: I don't give a shit.

title: Schedule
transcript: Glad you could fit us into your busy schedule, darling.

title: What the Fuck Did You Just Say To Me?
transcript: What the fuck did you just say to me?

title: Weepy-Willow
transcript: You fucking weepy-willow shit sack.

title: Weepy-Willow (Extended Ver.)
transcript: When did you become a fucking expert on what I can or cannot do, you fucking weepy-willow shit sack.

title: Self-Righteous Prick
transcript: God, you're a self-righteous prick.

title: Neiman - Johnny Utah
transcript: Fuck off, Johnny Utah. Turn my pages bitch.

title: Try Me, Weasel
transcript: Try me, you fuckin' weasel.

title: Fletcher Goes the Fuck Off
transcript: At 5:30, that's in exactly 11 minutes, my band is on-stage. If your ass is not on that stool with your own fucking sticks in hand, or if you make one fucking mistake, one, I will drum your ass back to Nassau where you can turn pages until you graduate or fucking drop out. By the time you're done at Shaffer, you're gonna make Daddy look like a fucking success story. Got it? Or, we can let Johnny Utah play the part.

title: Fruit Fuck
transcript: You fucking pathetic, pansy-ass fruit fuck.

title: Neiman - Fuck you, Fletcher
transcript: Fuck you, Fletcher. Fuck you.

title: Peaches and Cream
transcript: Although why anybody would have anything other than peaches and cream to say about me, is a mystery.

title: Let's Have Fun
transcript: Let's have fun.

title: You Think I'm Fucking Stupid?
transcript: You think I'm fucking stupid?

title: Eyes
transcript: I will gouge out your motherfucking eyes.

title: Motivation
transcript: The truth is, I don't think people understood what it was I was doing at Shaffer. I wasn't there to conduct. Any fucking moron can wave his arms and keep people in tempo. I was there to push people beyond what's expected of them. I believe that is an absolute necessity. Otherwise we're depriving the world of the next Louis Armstrong, or the next Charlie Parker.

title: Understanding
transcript: [Fletcher] There are no two words in the English language more harmful than 'good job'. [Neiman] But is there a line, you know, maybe you go too far and you discourage the next Charlie Parker from ever becoming Charlie Parker? [Fletcher] No man, no, because the next Charlie Parker would never be discouraged. [Neiman] Yeah.

title: I Tried
transcript: The truth is, Andrew, I never really had a Charlie Parker. But I tried. I actually fucking tried. And that's more than most people ever do. And I will never apologize for how I tried.
